participant_1.background:
I remember pretending to be a dragon trainer with my siblings at the park and getting lost in our imagination.
I enjoy taking yoga classes and am always looking for new ways to improve my practice.
my hobby creating houses out of matches.
I've seen a blue whale while on a boat tour in Alaska.
my favorite food is shrimp.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy the feeling of new sneakers on my feet.
i have driven a race car before.
i like baths.
My teeth hurt from not chewing my food properly, but I have to move my army to the new camp.
My family is very supportive of my education and has always encouraged me to follow my dreams.

content.text: I'm doing pretty well, thanks! How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking!
I enjoy taking baths, driving fast cars, and eating shrimp.
I love taking baths too! They're so relaxing. I've never driven a race car before, but it sounds like a lot of fun. Shrimp is delicious!
Yeah, baths are the best! I love the feeling of new sneakers on my feet too.
I've never driven a race car either, but I've always wanted to! Shrimp is one of my favorite foods too.
I enjoy creating houses out of matches, practicing yoga, and pretending to be a dragon trainer.
That's so cool! I've never heard of anyone creating houses out of matches before. I've always wanted to learn yoga. Dragons are so cool! I've never seen one in real life, but I hope to one day.
It's a fun hobby! It's a little tricky at first, but once you get the hang of it, it's really rewarding. I love dragons too! I've seen a blue whale before, but I've never seen a dragon.
That's amazing! I've never seen a blue whale before. I'm glad you've gotten to see both a blue whale and a dragon!
